Dear Hazara Women refugees- don't let anyone tell you to change your culture, your religion, your style, or your narrative to fit in west. You have been molding yourself to get acceptance in Afghanistan for a century. Now just be proud of who you are, preserve
#StopHazaraGenocide

Thank you for your support 
#StopHazaraGenocide https://t.co/ITPcNnLkOd
